content: Hi, can cargo bump tar please >= 0.4.36 - RUSTSEC-2021-0080 https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2021-0080.html - :)
@pinkforest(she/her) Sorry, I'm not sure what you mean. If you're asking about the builds of cargo itself, tar was updated about 4 months ago.
@Eric Huss 0.58.0 crate Cargo.toml still depends on tar 0.4.35 - same as master on github repo rust-lang/cargo

We should probably bump our req https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/blob/master/Cargo.toml#L57
But if we have not bean shiping bad versions then it is not so bad.
Dependabot and Deps.rs has been nagging me upstream @ geiger with it so thought to ping if you could :)
And the version we ship is set by the rustc lock file (right?) https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/Cargo.lock#L5136
it's pinned in the toml .lock isn't in the repo at least

Yea, that's the lockfile we use.

@pinkforest(she/her) If you want to update the minimum requirement, feel free to open a PR.
@Eric Huss looks like you got assigned - I did not mention RUSTSEC on the PR - https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/10198
